title: How is my singing? Link in description. - Quora

response.answer_text: Not that bad ….. it's gud … I'm no music professional or anything… I just love to listen to music…so it was gud…the humming part was gud..”hmm hmm”…i haven't listened to the original song so I can't compare …and idk if u r a professional singer or not…ifclassesu love singing then do take some classes … hope this doesn't makes u sad or anything… keep on singing even I do that but i don't have the guts to post a song ..hahah. n u r better than me…lol…have a great day

A lot of improvement needed.! Sorry but I just watched the movie yesterday and as you know whenever we hear a person singing a song, we compare it with the original one… Therefore I’d say you were a bit fast at a point, but your voice is good.! By the way, don’t think I’m rude.
